sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,ORDER_AMT ,DAIFA_AMT ,ORDER_STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,FINISH_TIME ,TRANS_ID ,TRANS_QID ,TRANS_FEE ,BATCH_ID ,T0_MER_RATE ,T0_MER_PROFIT ,T0_MER_GAIN ,T0_HX_PROFIT ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 FROM SUB_MER_CASHOUT WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_CASHOUT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(ORDER_AMT) Like '%'||(#order_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DAIFA_AMT) Like '%'||(#daifa_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_STATUS) Like '%'||(#order_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_QID) Like '%'||(#trans_qid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_FEE) Like '%'||(#trans_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_ID) =#batch_id#
(T0_MER_RATE) Like '%'||(#t0_mer_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_MER_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#t0_mer_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_MER_GAIN) Like '%'||(#t0_mer_gain:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_HX_PROFIT) =#t0_hx_profit#
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_CASHOUT WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_CASHOUT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(ORDER_AMT) Like '%'||(#order_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DAIFA_AMT) Like '%'||(#daifa_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_STATUS) Like '%'||(#order_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_QID) Like '%'||(#trans_qid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_FEE) Like '%'||(#trans_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_ID) =#batch_id#
(T0_MER_RATE) Like '%'||(#t0_mer_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_MER_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#t0_mer_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_MER_GAIN) Like '%'||(#t0_mer_gain:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_HX_PROFIT) =#t0_hx_profit#
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
